name: MPMediaGrouping
desc: Keys used to configure a media query.

items.name: case title
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by title. For songs, for example, the title is the song name. This is the default grouping key.

items.name: case album
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by album, and sorts songs within an album by track order.

items.name: case artist
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by performing artist.

items.name: case albumArtist
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by album artist (the primary performing artist for an album as a whole).

items.name: case composer
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by composer.

items.name: case genre
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by musical or film genre.

items.name: case playlist
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by playlist.

items.name: case podcastTitle
items.desc: Groups and sorts media item collections by podcast title.
